languages.text: {n}Что-то в вашем взгляде заставляет улыбки бандитов сползти с лица. Один из них что-то шепчет главарю. Тот цыкает зубом, пряча нервозность.{/n} "Гроксово семя... ну тебя. С дворцовыми выскочками связываться... уж больно много шума будет".

{n}Something in your gaze causes the bandits' smiles to disappear. One of them whispers something to the leader. The one-eyed man clicks his tongue to mask his trepidation.{/n} "Groxshit... Off with you. Putting down palace brats is more mess than it's worth."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то в вашем взгляде заставляет улыбки бандитов сползти с лица. Один из них что-то шепчет главарю. Тот цыкает зубом, пряча нервозность.{/n} "Гроксово семя... ну тебя. С дворцовыми выскочками связываться... уж больно много шума будет".

traits.locale_text: {n}Something in your gaze causes the bandits' smiles to disappear. One of them whispers something to the leader. The one-eyed man clicks his tongue to mask his trepidation.{/n} "Groxshit... Off with you. Putting down the palace brats is more of a mess than it's worth."

{n}Something in your gaze makes the bandits' smiles go away. One of them whispers something to the leader. The one-eyed man clicks his tongue to mask his trepidation.{/n} "Groxshit... Off with you. Dealing with nutters makes more of a mess than it's worth."

{n}Something in your gaze causes the bandits' smiles to disappear. One of them whispers something to the leader. The one-eyed man clicks his tongue to mask his trepidation.{/n} "Groxshit... Off with you. Putting down the mad makes more of a mess than it's worth."

{n}Something in your gaze causes the bandits' smiles to disappear. One of them whispers something to the leader. The one-eyed man clicks his tongue to mask his trepidation.{/n} "Groxshit... Off with you. Putting down the palace brats is more of a mess than it's worth."

languages.text: {n}你目光中的某种东西，让这个土匪脸上的笑容消失了。其中一个土匪对他们的头领低声说了几句，独眼土匪听后啧了啧舌，故作镇定。{/n}“格洛克斯兽的臭屎……你过去吧。没必要和这个宫殿里蹿出来的小崽子较劲儿，这对谁都不好。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your gaze causes the bandits' smiles to disappear. One of them whispers something to the leader. The one-eyed man clicks his tongue to mask his trepidation.{/n} "Groxshit... Off with you. Putting down palace brats is more mess than it's worth."

traits.locale_text: {n}你目光中的某种东西，让这个土匪脸上的笑容消失了。其中一个土匪对他们的头领低声说了几句，独眼土匪听后啧了啧舌，故作镇定。{/n}“格洛克斯兽的臭屎……你过去吧。没必要和这个宫殿里蹿出来的小崽子较劲儿，这对谁都不好。”
{n}你目光中的某种东西，让这个土匪脸上的笑容消失了。其中一个土匪对他们的头领低声说了几句，独眼土匪听后啧了啧舌，故作镇定。{/n}“格洛克斯兽的臭屎……你过去吧。要是事情搞大了，对咱们谁都不好。”

languages.text: {n}あなたの視線に何かが宿り、盗賊たちの笑みが消えた。一人がリーダーに何かを囁いた。​片目の男は、恐怖を隠すように舌打ちをした。{/n}「クソったれ…とっとと失せろ。イカレ野郎を始末すんのは、手間のわりに割に合わねぇ」
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your gaze causes the bandits' smiles to disappear. One of them whispers something to the leader. The one-eyed man clicks his tongue to mask his trepidation.{/n} "Groxshit... Off with you. Putting down the mad makes more of a mess than it's worth."

{n}あなたの視線に何かが宿り、盗賊たちの笑みが消えた。一人がリーダーに何かを囁いた。​片目の男は、恐怖を隠すように舌打ちをした。{/n}「クソったれ…とっとと失せろ。イカレ野郎を始末すんのは、手間のわりに割に合わねぇ」

languages.text: {n}Algo en tu mirada hace que las sonrisas de los bandidos se esfumen. Uno de ellos susurra algo al oído del líder. El tuerto chasquea la lengua para ocultar su agitación.{/n} «Mierda de grox... Anda, lárgate. No merece la pena mancharse las manos con los mocosos de palacio».
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your gaze causes the bandits' smiles to disappear. One of them whispers something to the leader. The one-eyed man clicks his tongue to mask his trepidation.{/n} "Groxshit... Off with you. Putting down palace brats is more mess than it's worth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo en tu mirada hace que las sonrisas de los bandidos se esfumen. Uno de ellos susurra algo al oído del líder. El tuerto chasquea la lengua para ocultar su agitación.{/n} «Mierda de grox... Anda, lárgate. No merece la pena mancharse las manos con los mocosos de palacio».

{n}Algo en tu mirada hace que las sonrisas de los bandidos se esfumen. Uno de ellos susurra algo al oído del líder. El tuerto chasquea la lengua para ocultar su agitación.{/n} «Mierda de grox... Anda, lárgate. No merece la pena mancharse las manos con una chiflada como tú».

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarındaki bir şey yüzünden haydutların gülümsemeleri kayboluyor. İçlerinden biri, lidere bir şeyler fısıldıyor. Tek gözlü adam, tedirginliğini gizlemek için dilini şaklatıyor.{/n} "Groks boku... Kaybolun. Saraylı veletleri haklayacağız diye ortalığı kirletmeye lüzum yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your gaze causes the bandits' smiles to disappear. One of them whispers something to the leader. The one-eyed man clicks his tongue to mask his trepidation.{/n} "Groxshit... Off with you. Putting down palace brats is more mess than it's worth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bakışlarındaki bir şey yüzünden haydutların gülümsemeleri kayboluyor. İçlerinden biri, lidere bir şeyler fısıldıyor. Tek gözlü adam, tedirginliğini gizlemek için dilini şaklatıyor.{/n} "Groks boku... Kaybolun. Saraylı veletleri haklayacağız diye ortalığı kirletmeye lüzum yok."

{n}Bakışlarındaki bir şey yüzünden haydutların gülümsemeleri kayboluyor. İçlerinden biri, lidere bir şeyler fısıldıyor. Tek gözlü adam, tedirginliğini gizlemek için dilini şaklatıyor.{/n} "Groks boku... Kaybolun. Delileri haklayacağız diye ortalığı kirletmeye lüzum yok."

languages.text: {n}Quelque chose dans votre regard fait disparaître le sourire des bandits. L'un d'eux murmure à l'oreille du chef borgne qui fait claquer sa langue pour dissimuler son inquiétude.{/n} « Bordel de grox... Débarrasse le plancher. J'ai pas de temps à perdre à calmer des pimbêches dans ton genre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your gaze causes the bandits' smiles to disappear. One of them whispers something to the leader. The one-eyed man clicks his tongue to mask his trepidation.{/n} "Groxshit... Off with you. Putting down palace brats is more mess than it's worth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelque chose dans votre regard fait disparaître le sourire des bandits. L'un d'eux murmure à l'oreille du chef borgne qui fait claquer sa langue pour dissimuler son inquiétude.{/n} « Bordel de grox... Débarrasse le plancher. J'ai pas de temps à perdre à calmer des pimbêches dans ton genre. »

{n}Quelque chose dans votre regard fait disparaître le sourire des bandits. L'un d'eux murmure à l'oreille du chef borgne qui fait claquer sa langue pour dissimuler son inquiétude.{/n} « Bordel de grox... Débarrasse le plancher. j'ai pas de temps à perdre à calmer des cinglées dans ton genre. »

languages.text: {n}Irgendetwas an deinem Blick lässt das Lächeln der Banditen verschwinden. Einer von ihnen flüstert dem Anführer etwas zu. Der Einäugige schnalzt mit der Zunge, um seine Angst zu verbergen.{/n} "Groxscheiße ... Verschwindet. Palastgören den Hals umzudrehen, hat keinen Wert."
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your gaze causes the bandits' smiles to disappear. One of them whispers something to the leader. The one-eyed man clicks his tongue to mask his trepidation.{/n} "Groxshit... Off with you. Putting down palace brats is more mess than it's worth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Irgendetwas an deinem Blick lässt das Lächeln der Banditen verschwinden. Einer von ihnen flüstert dem Anführer etwas zu. Der Einäugige schnalzt mit der Zunge, um seine Angst zu verbergen.{/n} "Groxscheiße ... Verschwindet. Palastgören den Hals umzudrehen, hat keinen Wert."

{n}Irgendetwas an deinem Blick lässt das Lächeln der Banditen verschwinden. Einer von ihnen flüstert dem Anführer etwas zu. Der Einäugige schnalzt mit der Zunge, um seine Angst zu verbergen.{/n} "Groxscheiße ... Verschwindet. Verrückte zu töten, ist die Mühe nicht wert."
